SEARCH
Package br.com.concepting.framework.service.annotations

Annotation Interface Transaction

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({TYPE,METHOD}) public @interface Transaction
Class that defines the service transaction annotation.
Since:
3.2.0

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    ContentType[]
    consumes
    Defines the mime-type accepted for API calls.
    ContentType[]
    produces
    Defines the mime-type of the API calling response.
    Class<? extends Throwable>[]
    rollbackFor
    Defines for which caught exceptions, the transaction should be rolled back.
    int
    timeout
    Defines the transaction timeout
    MethodType
    type
    Defines the method accepted for API calls.
    String
    url
    Defines the path for API calls.

  • Element Details

    • timeout

      int timeout
      Defines the transaction timeout
      Returns:
      Numeric value that contains the timeout.
      Default:
      -1

    • rollbackFor

      Class<? extends Throwable>[] rollbackFor
      Defines for which caught exceptions, the transaction should be rolled back.
      Returns:
      Array that contains the caught exceptions.
      Default:
      {java.lang.Throwable.class}

    • url

      String url
      Defines the path for API calls.
      Returns:
      String that contains the path.
      Default:
      ""

    • type

      MethodType type
      Defines the method accepted for API calls.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the method type.
      Default:
      NONE

    • consumes

      ContentType[] consumes
      Defines the mime-type accepted for API calls.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the mime-type type.
      Default:
      {NONE, JSON}

    • produces

      ContentType[] produces
      Defines the mime-type of the API calling response.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the mime-type type.
      Default:
      {NONE, JSON}
